title: Save Up to 32% on a Torras Phone Case With These Lingering Amazon Prime Day Deals
description: Amazon Prime Day is over, but there are still live deals that can help you save on accessories like these sturdy Torras phone cases.
author: Ingrid Cruz
excerpt: Amazon Prime Day is over, but there are still live deals that can help you save on accessories like these sturdy Torras phone cases.
text: If you recently upgraded your phone, you know how important it is to protect it. After all, even the most careful among us can have a phone fall, slip or scratch against an unfriendly surface. A reliable case can prevent your screen from getting any nicks and preserve your phone so that it's ready for future trade-ins. Cases can get pricey, but Amazon Prime Day, which just ended, unofficially started the holiday shopping and sales season, and there are still remaining deals that can help you save up to 32% on a Torras phone case. Amazon deals tend to fluctuate in price, so we suggest acting fast to nab your preferred case. Right now, you can save $12 on a Torras case for an iPhone 16 Pro when you click the on-page coupon. This case includes a nifty outer ring that can help you better grip your phone and acts as a kickstand. If you own an iPhone 16 Pro Max, you can nab a black Torras magnetic slim-fit case for just $19 with Prime and with the included on-page coupon. If you prefer the natural titanium colored version of this case, you can score it for only $26 with Prime as well as the included on-page coupon. Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money. You can also save on other Torras accessories right now, such as a two-pack of iPhone screen protectors for only $29 when you stack Prime member savings with the included on-page coupon. These screen protectors are also available for iPhone 14 and 15 and some iPhone 13 sizes as well. If you need two or more eligible Torras accessories, you can save an extra 5% with this Buy 2, save 5% offer on select items. Remember that these deals are around for a limited time. If you're looking for more phone accessories, earbuds and other devices, check out this list of the best remaining Prime Day Apple deals. CNET is always covering a wide array of deals on tech products and much more. Start with the hottest sales and discounts on the CNET Deals page, and sign up for the CNET Deals Text to get daily deals sent straight to your phone. Add the free CNET Shopping extension to your browser for real-time price comparisons and cash-back offers. And peruse our gift guide, which includes a full range of ideas for birthdays, anniversaries and more.

If you recently upgraded your phone, you know how important it is to protect it. After all, even the most careful among us can have a phone fall, slip or scratch against an unfriendly surface. A reliable case can prevent your screen from getting any nicks and preserve your phone so that it's ready for future trade-ins. Cases can get pricey, but Amazon Prime Day, which just ended, unofficially started the holiday shopping and sales season, and there are still remaining deals that can help you save up to 32% on a Torras phone case. Amazon deals tend to fluctuate in price, so we suggest acting fast to nab your preferred case.

Right now, you can save $12 on a Torras case for an iPhone 16 Pro when you click the on-page coupon. This case includes a nifty outer ring that can help you better grip your phone and acts as a kickstand. If you own an iPhone 16 Pro Max, you can nab a black Torras magnetic slim-fit case for just $19 with Prime and with the included on-page coupon. If you prefer the natural titanium colored version of this case, you can score it for only $26 with Prime as well as the included on-page coupon.

Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.

You can also save on other Torras accessories right now, such as a two-pack of iPhone screen protectors for only $29 when you stack Prime member savings with the included on-page coupon. These screen protectors are also available for iPhone 14 and 15 and some iPhone 13 sizes as well. If you need two or more eligible Torras accessories, you can save an extra 5% with this Buy 2, save 5% offer on select items.

Remember that these deals are around for a limited time. If you're looking for more phone accessories, earbuds and other devices, check out this list of the best remaining Prime Day Apple deals.
